displayName: Ensure S3 buckets are encrypted at rest
rationale: Amazon S3 Buckets should be configured with encryption at rest. This helps avoid risk caused by other misconfiguration which may enable inapproprite access to the bucket.
recommended_action:
1. Login to AWS Management Console and open the Amazon S3 console using https://console.aws.amazon.com/s3/ 
2. Select the appropriate bucket. 
3. Click on 'Edit' in the Default Encryption area.
4. Select 'Enable', and choose the appropriate encryption strategy. ''. 
5.After configuring SSE-S3 or SSE-KMS encryption, click save changes'.
For more information, visit https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/default-bucket-encryption.html
error_message: AWS S3 Bucket not encrypted at rest
ruleNames: Ensure AWS S3 buckets are encrypted at rest
